text: 28|46|hananim-i moseleul bulleoss-eul ttae geudaeneun ttuleusan jungteog-e issji ani hayeoss-eumyeo yeeonjadeul-ui iyagileul al ji moshaess-euna junimkkeseo neohuiege eunhyeleul bepul-eossnani ilo hayeo geu daega neohui ijeon-e yeeonjaga oji anihan baegseong-ege gyeong-gohayeo geudeul i gyohun-eul eoddolog ham-ila
